Articles.Content: I can't get to the moon, but I named an Kerbonaut after him and got him to the North Pole. I am trying to get to the moon but to no avail as of yet.
My fist mun landing, so here's my contribution.
I made it! hope I wasn't too late, it was my first completely manual mun mission in 0.17, here's my pic:

when i hear that Neil died i played taps on my bugle unfortunatly it was 12:00 so i woke everyone up oh well nothing is to extreme for Neil

RIP Neil Armstrong

*salutes*
It's time this thread had a rest, and rest in piece Neil.
